## JSONValue type

All values returned from Fauna are valid JSON values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type JSONValue =
  | null
  | string
  | number
  | boolean
  | JSONObject
  | Array<JSONValue>;
```

<b>References:</b> [JSONObject](./fauna.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->, [JSONValue](./fauna.jsonvalue.md)
